alert.note: Alert for Osage; Washington (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 23 at 4:43PM CDT until March 23 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Osage County in northeastern Oklahoma... Southern Washington County in northeastern Oklahoma... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 443 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hominy, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Bartlesville... Hominy... Barnsdall... Ramona... Wynona... Ochelata... Avant... Osage... Tallant... Wolco... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
